SELECT BOARD_CODE, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_WRITE_DATE , BOARD_DEL_FL FROM "TB_BOARD" JOIN "TB_MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_CODE, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_DEL_FL FROM TB_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY BOARD_NO

SELECT BOARD_CODE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CODE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') BOARD_UPDATE_DATE FROM "TB_BOARD" JOIN "TB_MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND
BOARD_KIND LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOOKS WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT BOOK_ID, COVER_URL,
CASE WHEN INSTR(TITLE, '-') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(TITLE, 1, INSTR(TITLE, '-') - 1) ELSE TITLE END AS TITLE, TITLE AS FULL_TITLE, CASE WHEN INSTR(AUTHOR, ',') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(AUTHOR, 1, INSTR(AUTHOR, ',') - 1) ELSE AUTHOR END AS AUTHOR, IS_DELETED, PUB_DATE
FROM TB_BOOKS BOOK WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND AUTHOR LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND IS_DELETED LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
ORDER BY TITLE) BK

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUM, BOOK_ID, COVER_URL, TITLE, FULL_TITLE, AUTHOR, DESCRIPTION, FIRST_CATEGORY, SECOND_CATEGORY, GENRES, PUB_DATE, CUSTOMER_REVIEW_RANK, REVIEWCOUNT, IS_DELETED FROM (SELECT BOOK_ID, COVER_URL, CASE WHEN INSTR(TITLE, '-') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(TITLE, 1, INSTR(TITLE, '-') - 1) ELSE TITLE END AS TITLE, TITLE AS FULL_TITLE, CASE WHEN INSTR(AUTHOR, ',') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(AUTHOR, 1, INSTR(AUTHOR, ',') - 1) ELSE AUTHOR END AS AUTHOR, DESCRIPTION, FIRST_CATEGORY, SECOND_CATEGORY, CONCAT(FIRST_CATEGORY, CONCAT(',', SECOND_CATEGORY)) GENRES, TO_CHAR(PUB_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PUB_DATE, ROUND(CUSTOMER_REVIEW_RANK, 1) CUSTOMER_REVIEW_RANK, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_STARPOINT TBS WHERE TBS.BOOK_ID = BOOK.BOOK_ID ) AS REVIEWCOUNT, IS_DELETED
FROM TB_BOOKS BOOK ORDER BY TITLE) BK

SELECT BOARD_CODE, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'

ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_WRITE_DATE , BOARD_DEL_FL FROM TB_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND 1 = 1
AND BOARD_KIND LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
